About Us

Lovely Bunch was founded on the idea that good food can be good for the planet.

We partner with agriculturalists and growers who are restoring degraded farmland through carbon-sequestering, water-resilient crops. These are thoughtful farmers who care deeply about what they grow and how they grow itâ€”people making ecologically sound decisions from the ground up.

Together, weâ€™re working to rebuild soil health, improve biodiversity, and create food thatâ€™s better for both you and the planet.

Apple Juice

Our first product is a small-batch apple juice made from heirloom varieties chosen for their floral, sweet, and tart balance. Each batch is pressed from whole fruit â€” never from concentrate â€” and crafted to taste like the orchard itself.

We searched for growers using sustainable orchard practices and found partners who share our belief that how something is grown matters just as much as how it tastes. The result is apple juice thatâ€™s bright, clean, and full of character.

We think itâ€™s the best apple juice youâ€™ll ever tasteâ€”and we hope it transports you, even for a moment, to where it began.

Why Regenerative and Sustainable Crops?Â 

â€¢ Â We source from carbon-sequestering and water-resilient crops grown by farmers devoted to land stewardship. These practices donâ€™t just sustain the soilâ€”they rebuild it.

â€¢ Â Healthy soil creates biodiversity, increases carbon capture, and strengthens watersheds. It leads to more resilient plantsâ€”ones that are naturally disease resistant, nutrient dense, and simply taste better.

â€¢ Â Perennial orchard crops, when grown as part of regenerative systems, are a proven, nature-based solution to climate change. By turning sustainably grown fruit into value-added products, Lovely Bunch helps create real incentives for farmers to continue restoring degraded farmland.

â€¢ Â The current food system isnâ€™t built to last. We believe change starts at the ground level by supporting growers who are creating new possibilities for the future of food.

At Kombucha Queen our vision is to create the best tasting healthy drinks, giving everyone the choice to change to an alternative that is healthy, natural and organic, without compromising taste and satisfaction.

What is Kombucha?

Kombucha is a fermented, lightly effervescent, sweetened green tea drink with culture of probiotic bacteria and yeast. Juice, spices, fruit or other flavorings are often added to enhance the taste of the beverage.
It is commonly consumed for its purported health benefits.

Kombucha has been called a health elixir, the tea of immortality, and a nectar of the gods. Fizzy, bright, and noted for its helpful probiotics, kombucha is made by combining sweet tea leaves with bacteria and yeast. The result is a sometimes sweet, sometimes tangy beverage that is typically served cold.

Why Kombucha Queen is different.

Kombucha is a healthy drink but not everybody likes it, since most kombuchas have a vinegar taste or are too acidic.

Kombucha QueenÂ Â has a very pleasant taste, full of probiotics and benefits, but not acidic or vinegary.

Kombucha QueenÂ is SHELF-STABLE, Â Vegan â€“ Organic â€“ Kosher â€“ Non-GMO â€“ Dairy Free â€“ Gluten Free â€“ Zero Sugar- Zero Carbs -Zero Calories Â â€“ Keto and tastes GOOD!

ENJOY its benefits!

Full of Flavor. Zero Sugar.

MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTSÂ  |Â Â NOTHING ARTIFICIAL Â |Â Â NO PRESERVATIVES Â |Â Â NEVER FROM CONCENTRATE

Moonglade Craft Soda hails from the sunny, beachside community of Oceanside, California.Â 

We started Moonglade because we wanted an invigorating, bubbly thirst quencher made with organic, wholesome ingredients, without all the sugar.Â  We researched historic soda recipes and worked hard to find a way to commercially produce these amazing, all-natural craft sodas.

We hope you find Moonglade Sodas to be a happy medium between mass-produced sugary sodas and zero-sugar alternatives.

Oh yeah, in case you were wondering, a moonglade is a rare, poetic term describing the reflection of the moonlight on water.

Cheers!

Jason & Crew

Moonglade Organic Ginger BeerÂ 

We think soda is better when it's made with wholesome, organic ingredients. Our fresh organic ginger is a great example. All of our craft ginger beers contain a healthy dose of ginger, which isÂ provenÂ to:

Perfect for sipping on a hot summer day. With over 25% less sugar than other root beer sodas, you can feel good about it. Enjoy root beer how it was meant to be, naturally brewed and full of real, natural flavor!

Reverse osmosis water, organic cane sugar, organic molasses, organic vanilla, organic botanical extracts, flavors, organic citric acid are used. Our natural brewing process requires pasteurization, making our root beer lightly carbonated with smaller bubbles.

Years of flavor research and ingredient sourcing have created a truly satisfying root beer.

You can finally join us in the world of MathÃ© Organics, a place where you can relax & explore the goodness of the best organic beverages we love most. Enjoy the simple things & tune in with the rhythm of the earth.

Our Mission is to create organic and well-balanced drinks without compromising taste.

Our vision is to empower our customers with a feeling of health and happiness, all whilst providing a drink thatâ€™s natural and packs a punch of flavour. We are here to turn the tables on artificial drinks, juices, and tasteless nutri-shakes.

We believe the worldâ€™s best flavours should be shared by everyone. A healthy drink should be simple; our approach has always been that "less is more", and we want to shine a light on the beauty of natureâ€™s flavours by combining only a few simple ingredients. We also believe that our drinks should benefit the planet, so we aim to leave everything better than when we found it.

Our Story

Jacopo and Adrien were travelling through Brazil when they first stumbled upon the fresh taste of Yerba Mate tea, which is a big part of the Carioca culture in Rio. They fell in love at first sip, and from then on, the drink became the source of their every conversation. Intent on bringing this unique flavour back to Europe, they spent the next few weeks scrawling plans on the beach, sketching bottle designs into the sand, and hunting down the best mate flavours Rio de Janeiro had to offer. Jacopo thought right away about mixing it with the Sicilian Lemons his grandfather used to give him for literally any reason, from starter to dessert, from food to medicine, from day to nighttime. And he got it right.

What had started as a holiday quickly became the business venture of dreams. Jacopo cancelled his flight home, moved to Santa Teresa, and spent the next two months on a quest to find the ideal suppliers for their plans. He eventually got back to London, fast forward nine months and many midnight kitchen formulations, MathÃ© Organics was born.

Flavours

Limonada MathÃ© Organic -Â Sicilian Lemon Ice Tea

An invigorating blend of sun-ripened Sicilian Lemons, Mate tea, fruity Guarana, and subtly sweet Grape Sugar. Our Organic Limonada MathÃ© iced tea drink packs a refreshing lemony punch, delivering natural and healthy freshness to your body, mind, and soul.

Aranciada MathÃ© - Organic Blood Orange Aranciada

A perfectly fizzy blend of the sweetest Italian Blood Oranges & invigorating Yerba Mate tea. We add a little fruity taste of Guarana along with a pinch of our subtle sweet Grape Sugar and Black Carrots. Our Aranciada MathÃ© drink delivers a triple-hit of minerals, antioxidants, and vitamin C to revive, refresh, and help keep you great all day. A unique taste.

Rooted in Culture, Born in New York City

More Than a Drink

The Lucky Ox honors Asian-American culture and the resilience of the immigrant journey. We craft culturally rooted beverages that go beyond refreshment, serving as a gateway to authentic flavors and timeless stories. â€˜It Wasnâ€™t Just Luckâ€™ is more than a slogan. Created by Karl Franz Williams, a Caribbean-American mixologist and restaurateur, Uncle Waithleyâ€™s â€œVincyâ€ Brew Ginger Beer with Scotch Bonnet Pepper is a nonalcoholic small-batch ginger beer that can add flavor to cocktails and mocktails. Itâ€™s made with fresh, flavorful, all-natural ingredients â€“ not extracts â€“ uniquely features Scotch bonnet, a pepper prized throughout the Caribbean and Africa for its heat and flavor, giving the beverage a spicy finish. Uncle Waitley's grinds and presses fresh Peruvian organic ginger, and then ages the ginger beer using its proprietary Vintage Fermentation process for richness and maturation. The added sugar is balanced with fresh-squeezed lime juice, turmeric, and mineral water infused with natural salts to enhance the flavors. The original Uncle Waithley, Williamsâ€™ grandfather, was a ginger farmer beloved by his family and community on the island of St. Vincent. Passionate about health, he made his own ginger beer and lived to be 100 years old. Ginger has long been recognized for its ability to treat digestive health issues, nausea, diabetes, and many other ailments. It also possesses anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidative, and antimicrobial properties, which can aid in the treatment of infectious diseases.Â 

Flavors

ORIGINAL â€“ The only ginger beer infused with Scotch Bonnet for a bold kick! Made with real ginger, turmeric for vibrant color, lime juice, and Caribbean-inspired mineral water, this all-natural brew offers a perfectly balanced, spicy flavor. Enjoy solo or with friends.Â 

SORREL â€“ Experience the vibrant flavors of the Caribbean with this traditional hibiscus-based beverage. Infused with warm spice notes, it offers a rich, floral taste thatâ€™s refreshingly sophisticated and perfect for any occasion. Enjoy it chilled or over ice.

PINEAPPLE â€“ Experience a bold, Caribbean-inspired flavor featuring smoky pimento wood, sweet pineapple, aromatic star anise, and a hint of thyme. This unique and complex blend offers a distinctive taste adventure. Perfect for any occasion.

Proudly Black Owned andÂ Based in Harlem, NYC.

column3:
We offer different and original drinks with an approach focused on the quality and taste of the product.

It may seem silly, but for us, a good drink is a drink that tastes good, has a list of understandable ingredients, and makes us feel good. We had almost forgotten that.

For all our drinks we therefore focus on the selection of quality ingredients, on the creation of original and gourmet recipes, and on artisanal manufacturing which does not distort the product.

And little by little we see that a non-alcoholic drink, well it can be cool! We explore new ingredients, new flavor combinations, we have fun creating drinks that look like us. Beautiful colorful labels, amber bottles...and why not, after all?

Our priority: is getting the best taste from the best ingredients.

Our recipes are 100% natural, organic, without colorings, without preservatives, without artificial flavors.

Artisanal infusions.

Each of our drinks is made from flowers, fruits and spices that we infuse in an artisanal way. This is the pillar of our know-how, to which we devote real work of research and precision to obtain a balanced result. This allows each variety that we use to reveal its properties and flavors without having to add anything.

Quality ingredients.

We source each ingredient from its land of origin to ensure that it is grown using traditional methods that respect its terroir. This requirement leads us to work with small agricultural cooperatives.

No added sugars.

We do not add sugar to our products. We simply add a light touch of honey or agave syrup to rebalance the combination of flavors. Thus our infusions are very light and very low in calories so that the tasting is as pleasant and subtle as possible.

Organic farming & fair trade.

The producers we work with are certified organic, which ensures the quality of our raw materials and consistency with our desire to offer healthy and 100% natural drinks without any additives. Some of our teas and spices are also certified Demeter (biodynamic cultivation) and Bio Solidaire (fair trade).

ZIA Ginger AleÂ combines a balanced amount of carbonated water, fresh pressed ginger root, a dash of cane sugar, a splash of lime and lemon juice, and Zia's signature red chile - all creating a delightful combination of smooth, and spicy with every drink.

Zia Nopales Prickly PearÂ has Nopal cactus pad with fresh-pressed prickly pears creates an enjoyable experience iconic to the American Southwest.

Zia Pinon ColaÂ has Kola nuts blended and brewed with piÅ„on nuts harvested from the Sangre de Cristo Mountains of Northern New Mexico. Zia Root BeerÂ is a delicious root beer with an exceptional flavor. Sweetened perfectly with cane sugar, a hint of anise, a pinch of licorice, a smidgen of mint, and a generous helping of clove. Add a dash of roasted barley malt, Yucca root, and a sprinkle of Madagascar bourbon vanilla - all together creating a memorable root beer experience for your pallet.

ZIA Sandia WatermelonÂ combines fresh watermelon with mint and lime juice. Our lowest sugar offering is with only 21 grams of real cane sugar per bottle. Uniquely refreshing and delicious!
Ingredients:Â Filtered carbonated water, cane sugar, watermelon, natural flavors, mint leaf, lime juice, vegetable juice for color.

The ZiaÂ regard the Sun as a sacred symbol. Their symbol, a red circle with groups of rays pointing in four directions, is painted on ceremonial vases, drawn on the ground around campfires, and used to introduce newborns to the Sun. Four is the sacred number of the Zia which can be found repeated in the four points radiating from the circle. The number four is embodied in:

The four points of the compass (north, south, east, and west);
The four seasons of the year (spring, summer, autumn, and winter);
The four periods of each day (morning, noon, evening, and night);
The four seasons of life (childhood, youth, middle years, and old age); and
The four sacred obligations one must develop (a strong body, a clear mind, a pure spirit, and a devotion to the welfare of others), according to Zia belief.

Our Organic Ginger Beer Comes with Digestive and Anti-Inflammatory Properties. It is Pleasent in the Mouth.

It has aromas of cola gummy sweet and a beautiful taste of freshly juiced ginger which leaves a pleasant tingly sensation on your lips.

It also has herbal/floral notes balancing the slightly spicy mouthfeel.

14 kcal / 100 ml

28 kcal / bottle

Ginger

Scientific name: Lingiber Officinale

Origin: Southeast Asia.

The root is often eaten as an accompaniment to meals, or preserved. It is widely used in flavoring recipes and excellent as an infusion. It has many medicinal uses as it promotes digestive functions, treats ulcers, prevents heart disease, and improves circulation. It is a natural anti-inflammatory.

You will find it in INDI GINGER BEER.

Lime Peel

Scientific name: Citrus Aurantiifolia.

Origin: Southeast Asia

This ingredient is used in many recipes to add flavor. It stimulates the digestive system, relieves congestion and nausea, and has vitamin C.

You will find it in ALL THE FLAVORS OF INDI.

CinnamonÂ 

Scientific name: Cinnamomum

Origin: Southeast Asia

Ground cinnamon is widely used in desserts, cakes, sweets, etc., and whole cinnamon is used to garnish and season some dishes. In America it is used in cinnamon tea, which is prepared by boiling Ceylon tea with a few cinnamon sticks in water until infused, adding sugar to taste. It has nutritional value, is non-fattening and helps lower glucose levels, is beneficial for cholesterol, has anticoagulant properties, stimulates brain function and aids relaxation.

You'll find it at INDI GINGER BEER

column3:
Living Drinks Crafted With Fruit & Botanicals

Kombucha is a fermented probiotic tea. We like to call it natureâ€™s original soda â€“ naturally carbonated and full of beneficial bacteria and digestive enzymes

Benefits Beyond Great Taste

Your gut does more than you realize! It plays a leading role in supporting our digestion, and strengthening our immunity, and has also been linked to increased energy, reduced stress, improved sleep, mood, and overall well-being.

Raw & Unpasteurized

Buchi is 100% raw & unpasteurized. The real benefits of drinking fermented, living drinks can only be found in the raw, unpasteurized varietyâ€”meaning the good bacteria remain alive and thriving, maintaining their probiotic goodness.

Open Air Fermentation

Following in the footsteps of our ancestors we ferment our drinks using a traditional method of open-air (lambic) fermentation. This method allows all the beneficial wild yeast and bacteria to make their way into our living drinks, creating more diverse, healthier microbes that are better for you and your gut!

Crafted with High-Quality Fair Trade Certified Tea & Sugar

All Buchi drinks are made using Certified Organic Fair Trade Sugar and Tea. We're incredibly proud of our Fair Trade partnerships and our amazing sourcing partners. All Fair Trade percentages are listed on our Kombucha, make sure to check next time you see one!

Thoughtful Ingredients,Â Sourced Sustainably

Every supplier we work with is vetted and validatedâ€”giving preference to those that meet robust third-party social and environmental criteria. Preference is also given to independent, woman, and minority-owned suppliers, as well as those located within 150 miles of our brewery â€“ when price and quality are equal. Weâ€™re passionate and committed to doing the hard work, to evolve and change, while keeping people, our purpose, and our planet at the forefront.

Ginger

Scientific name: Lingiber Officinale

Origin: Southeast Asia.

The root is usually taken as an accompaniment to meals, or preserved. Widely used in flavoring recipes and is excellent to drink as an infusion. It has multiple medicinal uses as it promotes digestive functions, treats ulcers, prevents heart diseases, and improves circulation. It is a natural anti-inflammatory.

You will find it in INDI GINGER BEER and INDI GINGER ALE

Turmeric

Scientific name: Curcuma Longa

Origin: India

It is one of the most used spices in Indian cuisine as a food coloring for rice, meat, and various dishes. It is also part of the spices that give color such as curry. It improves digestion, facilitates weight loss, fights colds and flu, prevents asthma attacks, detoxifies the liver, regulates intestinal flora, stimulates the immune system, and relieves skin inflammation such as eczema, acne, and psoriasis.

You will find it in INDI GINGER ALE

VanillaÂ 

Scientific name: Vanilla Fragrans

Origin: Central America

Its main use is as a flavoring in foods, especially in desserts. It is also used in cola recipes. Another important use is in perfumery. Vanilla has benefits as a stimulant of the nervous system.

You will find it in INDI GINGER BEER and INDI GINGER ALE

Organic and Certified by The Main International Organizations

Organic farming Europe

Products with this seal guarantee that:

At least 95% of the product ingredients have been produced according to ecological methods.

Also, that the product complies with the provisions of the official control system. And finally, the product comes directly from the producer or processor and is presented in a sealed container.

USDA Organic

Organic Certification according to the National Organic Program Standards (United States Department of Agriculture-USDA).

This certification applies to all stages of production, processing, distribution, control and labeling of products from agriculture to be marketed as organic, for human and animal consumption, except aquaculture.

Discover Our Organic Paris Cola!


The story of LaÂ Limonaderie de ParisÂ began in 2013, under the name Paris Cola, thanks to the ambition of an entrepreneur passionate about â€œMade in Franceâ€.

His ambition? Make the Capital sparkle with a local and 100% French drink.

Paris Cola quickly won the hearts of Ile-de-France residents and today make the Capital sparkle!

Finally an organic cola with a delicious taste!

This alternative drink will seduce you with its freshly tangy taste and its sweet caramel flavor. Plant extracts, caramel, and organic cane sugar for a decidedly different result.

Single format:

  • 33 cl glass bottle

The choice of organic. More health, more quality, more taste.

Top-quality organic kola nuts and cane sugar of strictly controlled organic origin give the classic cola flavor a natural and refreshing note. Biocola Levico goes perfectly with pizzas, especially those with organic ingredients and kamut flours, and also with tastier meats: the ideal choice to combine with the new trends of gourmet burgers, or with a classic barbecue.

Organic is an ethical choice for our well-being and that of our children. And also for the Earth.

Our drinks contain only fruit and ingredients from certified organic cultivations. In addition to the quality of the product, weÂ are convinced that organic is first and foremost an ethical choice for the well-being of our families and our children, as well as helping the planet.

Why organic?

  1. Organic food supports the earth: Organic food production has been around for thousands of years and is a sustainable choice for the future. Industrial agricultural practices are harmful to the environment due to the extensive use of synthetic chemicals and have led to environmental damage in many areas of the world.
  2. Choosing organic foods means supporting biodiversity, a fundamental aspect for life on the planet. Unfortunately, non-organic food, obtained from high-yield monocultures, is already seriously endangering biodiversity.
  3. Unlike products from mass industrial cultivation, organic products are not exposed to artificial ripening processes through the use of gas, as, for example, in the case of bananas.
  4. Choosing organic means ensuring a more sustainable future for future generations. Organic cultivation methods respect the land and are careful not to waste the planet's resources, starting with water, which is not polluted by pesticides that inevitably reach the aquifers through the soil.
  5. Organic agriculture, thanks to the exclusion of synthetic chemical products and the wise use of agronomic practices, boasts a strong potential in the mitigation of climate change, since it can reduce greenhouse gas emissions and sequester large quantities of carbon in soils.
  6. Most organic food simply tastes better than conventional food where pesticides are widely used.

Even daily consumption choices can influence and change the methods of mass production which are slowly impoverishing the soil and polluting the groundwater.Â Even when choosing a drinkÂ 

Ingredients:Â Â water, cane sugar*, burnt sugar*, carbon dioxide, natural spice flavourings, natural flavourings, acidifiers: citric acid.

*From organic farming

column3:
VIGO Kombucha is a pro-health herbal kombucha beverage that provides both refreshments and health benefits: no more and no less. We want to go back to the roots straight to the natural and old school way of creating naturally brewed beverages. The way our grandparents remember.

Â 

VIGO Kombucha is a natural antioxidant, it assists metabolism, and the immune system and has a detoxicating action. Therefore, it is an excellent alternative to all artificial or highly sweetened carbonated drinks.

What is kombucha?


Kombucha is a brewed tea, fermented by bacteria in a controlled environment, providing both great refreshment and pro-health benefits. The active ingredient for fermentation comes from SCOBY, a Japanese tea mushroom that is added for some time to pre-brewed tea.
We searched for the appropriately composed SCOBY for quite a long time. We created the drink from the best varieties of herbal teas and we have put a tremendous effort to ensure that VIGO fulfilled the high quality requirements. All without losing its refreshing and pro-health qualities during the production process.
We do not use regular sugar, sweeteners, or any aspartamates. We ferment the tea with fruit extracts, and thatâ€™s it. VIGO is gluten-free and contains substances, which create a friendly environment for the development of probiotics, which are beneficial for your immune system and digestion.

The benefits of Vigo kombucha

We do not intend to apply marketing jargon or colour reality. Briefly: our objective was to create something different. Something that is not only refreshing (cola) and stimulating (yerba), but something, which refreshes and is authentically healthy.

VIGO is a beverage prepared on the basis of the best SCOBY colony, herbal teas, and natural crystal clear spring water. The quality of these is monitored on an ongoing basis throughout the production process, to retain all the flavour values of the drink, and primarily all the refreshment qualities.

Kombucha symbiotic colony (SCOBY) is an herbal mushroom originating from Asia. It has been known for over two thousand years and it has been used in natural medicine for centuries because of its antioxidant, cleansing, and organism-strengthening properties. Fermented kombucha tea - one may drink it in the morning - as a morning wake-up drink, during the day - as a dose of additional energy, and also in the evening as a cleansing cocktail. And yes â€“ VIGO may be mixed with % which makes your life even better.

The virtues of Vigo: +Lactic acid, +Malic acid, +Apple vinegar, +Niacin, +Vitamin B6, +Biotin, +Vitamin B12.

Light brew flavours

VIGO Original

The legendary, original taste of VIGO Kombucha Original. The mixture of white and black tea, which as a result of the fermentation process gives a unique, very refreshing taste.

VIGO Maple
Unusual combination of kombucha and maple juice sourced from maple fruits and leaves. VIGO Maple is subtly sweet and intensively wild by nature. Totally unique â€“ refreshing, delicate and unrepeatable taste.

VIGO Schisandra
Original and sophisticated composition of kombucha and Schisandra
(Schisandra chinensis). Untamed but enormously gripping taste.

VIGO Acai
Even more fruits? Thatâ€™s right. VIGO Acai is extremely refreshing with a distinctive, deep flavour. Excellent taste and lots of health straight from the tropical forests of South America.

Long brew flavours

BIO VIGO Acerola+Ginger
Acerola+Ginger is the perfect blend of Acerola puree (high in Vitamin C) from the Amazonian rainforest in northern Brazil and Ginger from India, Guajarhat province. Handcrafted & fermented organic raw kombucha brewed with superfoods. Loaded with enzymes, electrolytes, probiotics, and live bacteria that boost your well-being.

BIO VIGO Cucumber+Coriander
Cucumber+Coriander is the perfect blend of Italian cucumber from Tuscany and coriander from Trentino-Alto Adige province in Italy. Youâ€™ll find their enzymes, electrolytes, probiotics, and live bacteria that will help brighten up your day. Fermented and crafted, brewed only in small batches.

BIO VIGO Rose
Rose is the delicate blend of Rose hips and petals from the Netherlands, Duin-en Bollenstreek province. Crafted in small batches. You'll find their enzymes, electrolytes, probiotics, and live bacteria that will illuminate your mood. Perfect for anyone looking for blossom taste.


BIO VIGO Yerba Mate
Grown in the Brazilian region of Parana, kombucha-fermented yerba mate tea is a highly nutritious and healthy source of energy. The tea is made from the Paraguayan holly plant and contains naturally stimulating caffeine. Kombucha yerba mate with caffeine boosts VIGOr and supports metabolism.

BIO VIGO Curcuma + Ginger
Curcuma + Ginger is the intense blend of Curcuma from the Peruvian province of Chanchamayo and aromatic ginger and pepper. Brewed only in small batches with the finest ingredients.

BIO VIGO Mango + Maracuja
Mango + Maracuja is the fusion of South American tropical fruits. The sweetness of the mango growing in the mountain climate of Colombian Cordillera breaks the tropical flavour of the Peruvian passion fruit to create an inVIGOrating composition.

Wellness shots

BIO Immunity
  • With organic/bio Acerola puree (source: Amazonian forest in Brazil) and Ginger (source: India)
  • High in Vitamin C (+/- 250mg per bottle)
  • Over 1 billion probiotics per bottle
BIO Energy
  • With organic/bio Matcha (source: Japan)
  • High in natural caffeine (+/- 70mg of natural caffeine per bottle)
  • Flavonoids, L-Theanine, Catechins and Polyphenols
  • Over 1 billion probiotics per bottle
BIO Detox
  • With organic/bio Turmeric and Black Pepper (source: India)
  • 100mg of curcuminoids and 30mg of piperine per bottle
  • Over 1 billion probiotics per bottle
BIO Relax
  • With organic Ashwagandha and Melissa/Lemon balm
  • High content of 1000mg of ashwagandha and 700mg of melissa per bottle
  • Over 1 billion probiotics per bottle
BIO CBD 10mg Full Spectrum (Limited Edition)
  • With the full spectrum bioavailable CBD phytocannabinoids
  • High content od 10mg of CBD per bottle (contains: CBDV, CBE, CBGA, CBG, CBD)
  • Over 1 billion probiotics per bottle
BIO Etam X VIGO Kombucha Beauty Shot
  • 10000mg of Collagen (extremely low molecular weight - 300Da)
  • High content of Vitamin C: 80mg per bottle (100% of daily intake)
  • Over 1 billion probiotics per bottle: Kombucha cultures, Lactobacillus Acidophilus & Lactobacillus Plantarum

Â Charity editions

JOK Kombucha Project

Â 

Charity initiative that unites! We are looking for warm and loving homes for homeless doggos. The name â€œJokâ€ is a tribute to the dog, which has become a symbol of the dog's loyalty and love for man in the city of Cracow. Each bottle represents a different dog for adoption.

Soda SavourÃ© Crafts Organic, Preservative-Free Sodas

Jess Messer is an activist, a mother of three, and the head of SavourÃ©. A former researcher and human rights worker, Jess decided to take a break from trying to save the world and tap her entrepreneurial spirit after leaving the US for Canada. Upon falling in love with MontrÃ©al she founded SavourÃ© in 2011 and jumped into the local food and farmers market scenes with both feet. She is driven by her dream of spreading the beauty of Vermont and QuÃ©bec through food while strengthening local food economies by creating delicious, thoughtful, handcrafted bubbly drinks that are made from real food grown where she lives.
Now back in Vermont, Jess transplanted her family and her business to her childhood home in Starksboro. She is also co-owner of Tandem, a Main Street production kitchen, event space, and tasting room in Bristol - you can come by any time the lights are on and try the latest flavours of SavourÃ© on tap. SavourÃ© is a team of two, Jess and her eldest daughter, Catherine, ably aided by our amazing VT distributors and copackers, also small family businesses.Â

column3:
Our Story

Fun, Flavor, and Wellness: The Kulturâ€™d Journey

Launched in 2020, Kulturâ€™d is a vibrant brand on a mission to make good health super fun. Our founder, Siddhi, discovered the magic of fermented foods and drinks and decided to share her love for them by crafting delicious kombuchas that you can easily include in your diet. We mixed the ancient science of probiotics with shiny modern machines, and bam, Kulturâ€™d was born! We whip up probiotic drinks that make your taste buds dance and keep your tummy smiling. Come join our exciting journey to a Kulturâ€™d life, where health is a blast!

We Brew The MostÂ DeliciousÂ Kombuchas

Made by fermenting whole-leaf tea, our kombuchas are gut-healthy and oh-so delicious. Formulated by top food scientists for the love of all things healthy.

Our Mission

In the ever-evolving beverage landscape, We are on a mission to make a mark by transforming health into a delicious experience. At Kulturâ€™d, weâ€™re crafting the tastiest and healthiest kombucha to redefine what a beverage can be. Join us as we pour innovation, wellness, and flavor into every bottle, setting a new standard in the industry.

Our Values

Delightful Wellness

At Kultur'd, we're passionate about turning wellness into a delightful journey. Our mission is to bring a smile to your face with every sip of our kombucha, packed with nourishing probiotics and flavors that awaken your senses. Discover how health can be a joyful experience with us.

Flavorful Fusion

We're the masters of flavor fusion, blending nature's best ingredients to create kombucha that's a celebration for your taste buds. Dive into a world of delicious complexity as we craft kombucha that marries unique flavors, resulting in a harmonious symphony of taste and wellness.

Indian Heart, Global Spirit

Kultur'd Kombucha brings you the best of both worlds. Rooted in the rich traditions of India and inspired by global wellness trends, our kombucha is a blend of cultures and flavors that will leave you craving for more.

Quality Craftsmanship

Crafting kombucha that's a cut above the rest is our commitment. We're obsessed with quality at every stage, from sourcing the finest ingredients to the meticulous fermentation process. Every bottle of Kultur'd Kombucha is a testament to our unwavering dedication to quality and excellence. Taste the difference, and savor the quality in every sip.

HealthyÂ MeetsÂ Delicious

Try our carefully curated blends - from spicy to fruity to floral, we have something for everyone!

Fatdane cola is the first of its kind in the world! An organic cola made from only natural ingredients: A funky and unique spice mix, caramelized sugar and juice from organic lemons. So neither phosphoric acid, ascorbic acid, citric acid or other chemical additives that a cola normally contains.

The juice from the lemons and the spice notes provide a fantastic mouth-watering balance and just the right old-school taste.

Â That's cola in a cool way!

Microbrewery

The story of Fatdane started in 2015 when we as some of the first decided to create a microbrewery that makes soda. The idea is the same as other smaller breweries - we want to challenge the existing industry which makes products with a low focus on sustainability and honesty. Since then, we have sold millions of bottles in Denmark, Switzerland, the USA, Canada, Sweden, Finland, and the UK, as well as a number of smaller export markets.

Fatdane - it's all good!

Our philosophy is simple - we want to create honest products that can be enjoyed with a clear conscience

We have dropped all the unnecessary dyes and preservatives. From the very beginning, we have wanted to set new standards for innovation and the use of real raw materials. We are uncompromising in our search for the best organic taste - completely free of pesticides and other harmful substances.

Quality raw materials

When we are looking for new flavors, it is based on what we can find locally and organically. We work with the farmer and ensure that our juice is absolutely perfect - every time!

Organic

Organic is good for groundwater and diversity - we naturally avoid the use of pesticides. We work for a world that thinks and acts organically - for the benefit of animals, humans, and our planet.

Produced in Denmark

Everything is produced locally and in Denmark. We try to reduce transport on the road as much as possible and we therefore have stock in 3 places in Denmark - so we save the environment for transport and CO2.

THE SEEK NORTH DIFFERENCE

Seek North is a local, New York-based premium kombucha company. We emphasize the importance of feeling good and being healthy and intentional in a holistic sense, which is why we are certified organic and use only premium organic ingredients. Each batch is brewed the traditional way (not pasteurized, â€‹not â€‹diluted, â€‹and with noâ€‹ added sugarsâ€‹ in the second fermentationâ€‹).Â 

Seek North is also one of the few kombucha brands that has made philanthropy a central part of our mission.Â  â€‹We know that one of the best and most sustainable ways to feel good is to give back. That is why we donate a portion of our proceeds to Global Lyme Alliance and continuously seek to develop partnerships with other businesses in our community.

AUTHENTIC | RAW KOMBUCHA

â€œDrinking kombucha should be easy so we created a premium kombucha that you can drink everyday.
Real kombucha that's made simple- low sugar, full flavored with full benefits. Be inspired.

NEW YORK PREMIUM KOMBUCHA

Our kombucha is alcohol-extracted, Certified Organic, Certified Kosher, and always 100% raw, all-natural, and undiluted.

BOTTLED FLAVORS

Seek Vitality:
Blue Spirulina & White Grape

Refreshingly crisp white grape juice is complemented by holy basil, a citrusy and subtly clove-like leafy green with adaptogenic properties. This transcendent sweetness is grounded with a gentle tingle of fresh-pressed ginger and the earthy taste of blue spirulina, which provides this â€˜booch with its signature hue and vitality-boosting properties.

Ingredients:
Live kombucha base brew of organic black tea and organic green tea, Organic blue spirulina, Organic holy basil, Fresh pressed organic ginger juice, and Organic white grape juice.

Seek Harmony:
Hibiscus & Ginger

The tangy boldness of tropical hibiscus and the rooty, lemon-spice flavors of ginger complement and accentuate one another. Each bottle is packed with flavonoids, vitamin C, digestion helpers, and inflammation fighters to help your body achieve a perfect internal balance. Itâ€™s also the perfect â€˜booch for newbies due to the unique soft, dry flavor.

Ingredients:
Live kombucha base brew of organic black tea and organic green tea, Organic hibiscus flower, Organic fresh pressed ginger.

Seek Immunity:
Elderflower & Pineapple

The sweet, indulgent flavor of pineapple juice does a tropical tango with the hoppy-tasting flavor of elderflower. The delectable combo provides a concentrated dose of multiple vitamins and minerals as well as ancient immunity-boosting benefits. Super smooth and refreshing, itâ€™s no wonder this was a 2020 Good Food Award finalist.

Ingredients:
Live kombucha base brew of organic black tea and organic green tea, Organic pineapple juice, and Organic elderflower.

Seek Clarity:
Pomegranate & Blueberry

Blueberryâ€”nature's preferred brain-boosting nootropicâ€”radiates its deep, jammy goodness and all its clarifying benefits through this brew. One of the healthiest foods on the planet, pomegranate is the perfect sidekick thanks to its famous, deep berry-cherry flavor and more heart-healthy goodness. Amplify mental clarity with this deep, bold flavor, the tartest in our lineup.

Ingredients:
Live kombucha base brew of organic black tea and organic green tea, Organic blueberry juice, Organic lemon juice, Organic pomegranate juice.

column3:
We brew every small batch by hand, the right way, right here in Florida. Weâ€™ve searched the world for the best fair-trade organic teas and curated a variety of unique ingredients to complement the flavor of our kombucha. And we havenâ€™t forgotten that when you put the best into something, you get the best out of it.Â 

Earth Conscious. Health Conscious. People Conscious.Â 

Weâ€™re out to prove that doing good is good for business. So weâ€™ve built our business by making products that are not just delicious and low in sugar and calories but also cleanly sourced and fairly made. We consider the impact of our choices on people and the planet and are continually striving to do better.

100% Composting

All spent teas and cultures from our brewing process are composted with local community gardens located primarily in Title 1 schools in Pinellas County, Florida.

Solar Power

Mother Kombucha is based in the Sunshine City so it only makes sense to harness some of that clean energy. Solar roof panels at the Mothership are just one of the ways we are reducing our carbon footprint.

Living Wages

All full-time employees start at or above local living wage levels, as established for our county. We also provide paid time off for volunteer work.

Fresh. Innovative. All Naural. Vegan. Gluten-Free. Always Raw, Never Pasteurized.Â 

â€‹At Laurentian Brew, there are no compromises. Our kombucha is brewed using traditional methods with only the finest, organic ingredients so you can sip, smile, and enjoy.

Whole, Natural, Organic IngredientsÂ 

We enjoy experimenting with flavours for our kombucha. This is the best part! (aside from drinking it of course). Our recipes are simple and we like to keep our ingredient list short with an emphasis on whole, high-quality ingredients. We want the natural tart flavour of kombucha to shine through each infusion as a tasty, energizing refreshment enjoyed any time of day.Â 
â€‹
We brew our kombucha the traditional way using all organic ingredients creating a raw, vegan, gluten-free beverage that is non-alcoholic, never pasteurized, and formulated to appeal to all ages. Our kombucha contains active enzymes, B vitamins, live bacteria cultures, and organic acids that help with digestion and improve gut health.Â 

What sets us apart is not only our deliciously distinct sweet-sour brew but also how we flavour. We use whole fruit and herbs to infuse our kombucha, lending a more natural, robust flavour unique to our kombucha.Â 

We brew with care in small batches in the Ottawa Valley.

Flavours

Cranberry Chill with Cranberry, Mint.

All of our ingredients are Organic, Gluten-Free, Dairy-Free, Egg-Free, Nut-Free and Vegan.

column3:
Enhancing Flavors and Benefits

We crafted our authentic organic kombucha from the ground up and elevated it to new heights. We blend it with fresh juices (never from concentrates), superfoods, and medicinal flowers, unlocking a symphony of flavors, and enhancing its already impressive array of benefits.

Naturally Fermented

We embrace the wisdom of the past. Kombucha 221 BC honors the simplicity of traditional recipes, creating probiotic drinks that nourish our bodies and spirits. Each handcrafted beverage contains probiotics made by nature, with the power ofÂ medicinal herbsÂ and the joy of sharing good food with people you love.

Our Flavors

Rose & Lemonade: Inspired by Floridaâ€™s ever-blooming roses, capturing their delicate scent and stunning colors. This refreshing drink honors these resilient flowers and the age-old wisdom of Traditional Chinese Medicine. With the zesty kick of freshly peeled lemon enhancing the roseâ€™s fragrant notes, this beverage offers a vibrant and refreshing experience, reflecting a perfect balance of floral elegance and citrusy freshness.

Berry & Hibiscus: Perhaps our best blend for those entering the world of kombucha, this easy-drinking, approachable combination of both sweetness and tartness from berries provides all the benefits of drinking kombucha without the typical vinegary tang that many people find challenging. The floral undernote of hibiscus at the end rounds out the flavor profile making it a highly enjoyable blend for a broad range of pallets.

Mango & Dandelion: One sip of this lightly sweet, ripe mango flavor and youâ€™ll be transported to the sun-drenched beaches of exotic Mexico. With mellow botanical notes from dandelion and an exciting burst from cayenne, this blend will satisfy your taste buds. Ay, SÃ­!

Lavender & Moringa: Refreshing and grassy, the light, citrusy flavor of green tea and moringa provides a fortifying base for the blend and mingles harmoniously with the rich and floral lavender finish. The refreshing and citrusy start, followed by the mellow and floral lavender finish, suggests a blend that is both invigorating and calming.

Passion Fruit & Red Clover: Tropical and blossoming the light citrusy flavor of passion fruit leaves and green tea mingle beautifully with the mellow flowery and botanical red clover end notes. Tropical flair and floral elegance, bottled for your flavor experience.

Tangerine & Marigold: A touch of sunshine, a splash of color, and quite a bit of surprising citrus perfectly balanced with the creaminess of vanilla. This blend produces a bright and tropical tonic thatâ€™s both refreshing and uplifting â€” perfect to be enjoyed at any time or place.

Grapefruit & Bee Pollen: This delicately effervescent kombucha gives you the subtle, sweet taste of honey from the bee pollen on the front end, with the dynamic and satisfying tartness of grapefruit as a palate-cleansing finish.

Orange & Turmeric: Awaken your taste buds with the harmonious spiciness of aromatic cinnamon and turmeric, while the sweet and thirst-quenching taste of oranges round out each sip. Warm and slightly peppery blend for those seeking refreshment with a unique flavor sensation.

Ginger: This ginger may surprise you. While the warming and spicy taste of ginger is clearly prominent, the blend with green and black teas and delicate effervescence soften this herbâ€™s usual bite for a flavor that is smooth and delightful to drink.

column3:
Cheers to you taking care of you with our delicious living bubbles!Â 

Tonica kombucha was created back in 2006 when Zoey Shamai, a yogi blown away by kombuchaâ€™s digestive benefits, set forth her vision to put a delicious spin on the ancient digestive tonic Kombucha. Â 

Her inspired vision lives on today in every bottle of Tonica Kombucha spanning across Canada in over 2500 stores, so that everyone and not just the hard-cores, can enjoy Tonicaâ€™s sumptuous, sparkling happy belly boost.

Tonica Kombucha In The Modern World

Today, we brew Tonica kombucha with the traditional recipe, fermenting in small, lightlyÂ carbonated batches infused with the powerful anti-oxidants and minerals of our tea, fruit, and herb-based beverage.

Kombucha is made by fermenting the kombucha culture aka SCOBY (symbiotic culture of yeast and bacteria) in a sweet, caffeinated tea. The SCOBY metabolizes both the caffeine and sugar in the tea and after fermenting for up to 30 - 60 days produces an array of healthful acids and living enzymes in the tea.

This is a living and sometimes effervescent tea filled with good bacteria, digestive enzymes, and liver-cleansing acids.

Brewed in small artisanal batches, Tonica's authentic recipe ensures the quality of kombucha in every bottle is extremely pure.

We donâ€™t take shortcuts with fermentation.Â We ferment in 2.5-gallon jars for 60 days to ensure our kombucha is fully fermented and full of active, strong healthy bacteria, enzymes, and beneficial acids.

This means that every bottle of Tonica will vary slightly in flavour and bubble and come to you in its all-natural organic state, filled with all the benefits associated with true raw kombucha. Tonica is a true Tonic.

Expectant Mothers Take Note

Although many women find Kombucha to be balancing for the hormonal system, it contains a high amount of lactic acid, and therefore pregnant women should consult their physician before consuming.

We are artisanal creators of certified organic Kombucha, Sauerkraut & Therapeutic Herbal Tea Blends.

Our Story

In 2011 I started a small sole trader business called Herbs of Life. I didnâ€™t see the main objective at the time but I felt I wanted to create a business that produced therapeutic healing herbal teas, traditional kombucha, and living foods.

I journeyed for 3 years into my own health studying Iridology, Naturopathy, and Herbal Medicine. I fell in love with the art and science of traditional healing. I felt a re-connection with nature and my body, mind, and soul. Our journey with food, nourishment, and conscious practice never ceases.

This was going to be my new path in life, healing with real foods and nature medicine and working with people to facilitate their journey. These main fundamentals of healing began with food and the respect of food as thy medicine, and thus Herbs of Life was born.

12 years on Herbs of Life has organically grown and continues nourishing people. My conscious connection with life, food, and healing continues to this day.

Our fermented organic Kombucha is made with Blue Mountains spring water, certified organic raw cane sugar, kombucha mother and certified organic fair trade green tea, certified organic juices and love.

Herbs of Life acknowledges the Traditional Owners of Country throughout this land of the Lemuria / Terra Australis / Gondwana, commonly known as 'Australia'. We pay our respects to all Elders past and present and honour all Originies and the Original Suv'erans' culture and customs and their continued work for the nurture of this land.

column3:
Our Kombucha Process

We use a meticulous two-stage fermentation method that infuses every bottle with the phenomenal flavour and fantastic fizz that we strive for.

Our recipe begins with a blend of green and black teas, which are then fermented over several weeks with a symbiotic culture of bacteria and yeast lovingly called the Scoby.

Once the Scoby has worked its magic, we replace it with organic ingredients like herbs, juices, and green tea. These botanicals steep for several days, infusing our kombucha with their rich and complex flavours.

Weâ€™re always busy brewing our next batch, but that doesnâ€™t stop us from trying new things.

Weâ€™re tirelessly experimenting with new recipes and techniques in search of future favorites. Whenever we find a concoction we love, we develop it, perfect it, and add it to the family.

Once our kombucha has been fermented and flavoured, we bottle it and send it to stores all over the island of MontrÃ©al and its surrounding areas. Certain locations also have Fous de Lâ€™Ã®le on tap, so you can refill your own bottles.

Our Story

Like all great and wonderful things in life, MOMO started with an adventure. Our founders, Josh and Lisa, discovered kombucha back in 2016 while on a trip to the Big Apple.Â 

Drinking it made them feel amazing, so on return to London, they started homebrewing kombucha in their kitchen.

They completely fell in love with the process.

Jobs were quit and they dove headfirst into their dream of producing the UKâ€™s tastiest and highest quality kombucha.

From the very beginning, MOMO has always been about quality.

Josh and Lisa committed early-doors to brewing completely unfiltered kombucha, in small glass jars with organic ingredients

Why Choose MOMO?

This is the only way to produce the highest quality and tastiest kombucha

Four Award-Winning Flavours

Born and brewed in Dubai using 100% raw, organic, low sugar, unpasteurized ingredients, Saba Kombucha is a naturally fermented tea. Jam-packed with gut-loving probiotics and electrifying enzymes, this is a brew your body and taste buds will love!

The Story

A legend in more ways than one, Kombucha was created over 2000 years ago by ancient Chinese Qigong masters.
Referring to it as their â€˜Tea Immortalityâ€™ they would come down from the mountains every Spring to ferment their tea and return in Summer to share their magical elixir. These energy masters believed it had an untapped healing power and helped create harmony within the mind, body, and spirit. If itâ€™s good enough for a Qigong master, we say itâ€™s good enough for us!

The Process

Our Kombucha brew is raw and unpasteurized because we are adamant about protecting all those delicious live cultures and probiotic power! This means that with every sip of Saba Kombucha, you consume billions of healthy gut microbes to make sure your digestive system is running on all cylinders.

About Mighty Brew

Mighty Brew Kombucha is a premium sparkling fermented tea that tastes deliciously elegant and subtle thanks to our unique use of premium natural botanicals. Our Raw Organic Mighty Brew Kombucha is an outstanding non-alcoholic health-focused drink, thatâ€™s low in sugar and calories. Itâ€™s also bursting with live cultures, minerals, vitamins, organic acids, and nutrients indispensable for the proper functioning of the body.

Expertly brewed by us in Winchester, Hampshire to the highest standards of production respecting time-honored techniques. We use only the freshest, finest ingredients that nature can offer, ensuring that Mighty Brew is certified Soil Association Organic and Vegan Certified.

We are dedicated to ethically sourced Organic and Vegan products, and our Mighty Brew real kombucha drinks are great to enjoy whether youâ€™re relaxing at home, seeing friends, or out and about!

Mighty Brew Premium Organic Kombucha

At Mighty Brew Kombucha we are dedicated to perfecting exceptional Kombucha with all-natural taste. Our award-winning Kombucha is expertly brewed by us here in Hampshire to the highest standards of production respecting time-honored techniques. From field to bottle we invest both love and dedication, for a wonderfully healthy, sparkling fermented tea drink thatâ€™s non-alcoholic, low in sugar and calories. It tastes deliciously elegant and subtle thanks to our unique use of premium natural botanicals.

We are passionate about the need for our real Kombucha to follow the full fermentation journey. It allows us to make sure we use only the freshest, finest ingredients that nature can offer â€“ filtered water, Organic tea, Organic unrefined cane sugar, premium Organic botanicals, and Organic Kombucha culture.

Mighty Brew premium Kombucha is raw, unpasteurized, and packed with natureâ€™s goodness. Itâ€™s bursting with live cultures, along with minerals, vitamins, organic acids, and nutrients indispensable for the proper functioning of the body. This authentic Kombucha is made using an advanced three-stage water filtration system for purity and it contains zero flavorings, sweeteners, colors, or preservatives.

Botanical Range

There is a growing awareness and interest in botanicals as part of â€˜being healthy, staying healthyâ€™. We have carefully chosen the different botanicals for Mighty Brew Kombucha taking into consideration their elegant and subtle taste, as well as the potential health and well-being benefits that they are traditionally believed to offer. Our Mighty Brew Botanical range includes classic Sencha, fragrant Jasmine, citrusy Lemongrass, and floral Elderflower. We love that the passing of the year is marked by different seasons and that each season brings its own wonder and beauty. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re passionate about offering special limited edition Kombucha such as Winter Chai and Summer Bliss, recognizing the different health and wellness needs that each season brings.

Heritage Range

We are delighted to collaborate with Liz Earle Wellbeing founded by our friend Liz Earle MBE for this celebratory cork and cage Heritage range. Mighty Brew Heritage X Liz Earle Wellbeing Kombucha is specially matured to enhance its Champagne and Prosecco-like qualities, for a more sophisticated sensory experience. Our range includes Heritage Blush Rose with its delicate pink color and expressive bouquet; Heritage Elderflower Sec with its citrusy floral notes and exquisitely dry taste; and Jasmine Bellini with its charming hue and fruity flavor. Serve in a champagne glass for a refreshingly elegant way to celebrate and enjoy life every day!

column3:
The organic tea drink
that invigorates the body, mind and so much more...

We are a French and artisanal company, located in the South West, in Agen. We produce in an artisanal way and with 100% organic and premium products, a quality kombucha, alive because it is not pasteurized.

We are committed to creating organic, healthy and tasty products in order to offer consumers delicious drinks that are beneficial for their health and well-being.

We are committed to an ecological and responsible approach by using glass packaging, which is infinitely recyclable. Recycled in a closed loop, glass is the perfect example of a circular economy. It is recognized as being the safest material for preserving drinks and food, including our live kombucha.

100% of our raw materials are ORGANIC and come from suppliers and partners committed to ORGANIC. We are certified by the ECOCERT organization. We use fair trade labeled raw materials as much as possible in order to support a fair, sustainable and farmer-friendly trade model.

We are a team passionate about healthy eating. We promote apprenticeship and are committed to our region in order to promote the employment of young people at the end of their training course. We place people at the heart of our company in order to contribute to the well-being and development of our employees.

We are committed to continuous improvement of our products and our processes.

We sort and recycle our waste.

We are convinced that all of these actions contribute, on our scale, to improving our health and preserving our planet.

7 original recipes

100% organic, 100% natural, 100% Made in France

column3:
Â 

Organic Real Cherry Cola

Gusto Organic Real Cherry Cola is a flavour that resonates with soft drinks fans across the ages. Itâ€™s a naughty secret â€“ an indulgent delight. When we were thinking about the drinks we most enjoy, cherry cola was right up at the top of the list.

Then we started to look around at the competition. Was there really an organic cherry cola (or, indeed,Â anyÂ form of cherry cola) that ticked our boxes and pressed those flavour buttons that reside deep in our memories?Â 

Â In short, the answer was no. The leading cherry colas in Europe were not the stuff of our dreams. As with so many soft drinks, they were packed with refined sugar, or for the zero-calorie obsessed, they were humming with artificial sweeteners. There was nothing really organic available at all. Naturally, that got us thinkingâ€¦

Looking a little closer at most cherry colas, we found that there rarely seems to be much cherry juice involved. Neither could we really see where the caffeine comes from, and â€“ to top it all â€“ the festivals of E-numbers were loaded with phosphoric acid (or E338, as it is less charmingly known). Weâ€™re not big fans of phosphoric acid and firmly believe it has no place in our food and drink. Why blend a drink with a chemical rust remover thatâ€™s used to make artificial fertilizers? Itâ€™s beyond us.Â 

So, it was with this challenge that we devised our very own Gusto Organic Real Cherry Cola,Â a wonderful sharp, sweet blast of organic cherry juice perfectly balanced with organic and Fairtrade Madagascan vanilla. In place of E338 we bring in that distinct bite with organic lemon juice. We sweeten with that most luxurious of sweeteners, organic blue agave from Jalisco in Mexico â€“ a warm, sweet nectar that brings a unique flavour dimension whilst also allowing us to cut down on calories (blue agave is sweeter than sugar and 25% lower in calories).Â 

To this blend of fruit, spices and organic essential oils we add kola nut from the rainforests of Africa, a sublime and ceremonial ingredient that offers mild caffeine stimulation through theobromine â€“ literally translated as â€˜The Food of the Godsâ€™.Â  No synthetic caffeine here, just kola nut to bring those memories flooding back, and a gentle lift to an organic cherry cola like no other. So, welcome to the world of Gusto Organic Real Cherry Cola â€“ unique, and (we think) an indulgent and tantalising beauty to consume.

column3:
Modest Beginnings with Resourceful Determination

Kommunity Brew is on a mission to become a national beverage icon, producing the healthiest options for the changing Australian lifestyle. Founders Mason and Jarred worked seven days a week, building their dream, and success has come early and often.

Our Flavours

Ginger Turmeric x 3

Whole Ginger and TurmericÂ undergo steeping and boiling processes before combining with our powerful kombucha base. The result is a mild spice with earthy, sourÂ notes. This kombucha exhibits a light orange glow, attributed to the turmeric.

Jasmine Green Tea xÂ Â Â 

Jasmine Green Tea is a natural source of antioxidants. Characterised by the alluring aroma of Jasmine Flowers, this kombucha boasts a delightful sherbert tang, reminiscent of green grapes.Â 

Raspberry Blossom x 3

Raspberry Leaf and Hibiscus Rosella fuse to produce fruity and herbaceous flavours of fresh berries and thyme. This kombucha exhibits a soft crimson colour, due to the rich colour of the hibiscus flower.

Tropical Hops x 3

Australian-grown HopsÂ provide a medley of floral, fruity, and juicy notes to this kombucha, reminiscent of mango and stone fruit.

Â 

Kommunity Brew acknowledges the Traditional Owners of the land on which we brew, the Whadjuk people of the Noongar nation and pays our respects to Elders past, present & emerging.

What is Bruja Sana Kombucha?

Bruja Sana Kombucha isÂ a tea fermented through a live culture consisting ofÂ beneficial bacteria and yeasts. Our Kombucha has the perfect balance of sweet and sour flavor with a touch of acidity, bubbly, and unforgettable texture.

Brewed according to anÂ ancient tea recipeÂ with a reputation for medicinal qualities. Its fermentation transforms the infusion into an effervescent, refreshing drink full ofÂ probioticsÂ with a variety of vitamins and organic acids.

Benefits of Bruja SanaÂ Kombucha

Bruja Sana Kombucha is aÂ fermented drink, made using an organic crop known as SCOBY. This fermented drink has differentÂ benefits and propertiesÂ that favor the good health of the body.

Among the many benefits that are currently known about Kombucha, we can mention theÂ reduction of cholesterol and blood pressure, as well as reducing the spread of cancer cells.

In addition, it has been discovered that it offers several improvements inÂ liver, digestive, immune functions,Â and much more.

Bruja SanaÂ KombuchaÂ is made with unrefined cane sugar, an organic tea base, and a bacteria and yeast culture. All this is left to rest for the necessary time and we obtain ourÂ delicious and refreshingÂ effervescent drink full of:

  • PROBIOTICS
  • ANTIOXIDANTS
  • ENZYMES
  • ORGANIC ACIDS
  • VITAMINS B1, B2, B3, B6, B12

Â 

Among the many benefits thatÂ Bruja SanaÂ KombuchaÂ brings to your body, we can mention the following:

  • REGULATES YOUR INTESTINAL FLORA
  • STRENGTHEN YOUR IMMUNE SYSTEM
  • STRENGTHEN YOUR DIGESTIVE SYSTEM

column3:
All hail the mighty Equinox Kombucha

Craft brewed in the UK, Equinox Organic Kombucha is cultured to create a healthy fermented green tea that contains live cultures, organic acids, and antioxidants.

Our regular customers report improved energy levels, better sleep, and a positive effect on their digestive health.

Being healthy is seriously important to us. Itâ€™s right up there with good taste because if it doesnâ€™t pass the taste bud challenge, we donâ€™t want anything to do with it.

As well as being unbelievably delicious, our wondrous organic Kombucha is also vegan and gluten-free. That means you might find some bits of Kombucha tea culture in your drink. Donâ€™t worry, floating blobs and strands of culture are a natural characteristic. Those are the good bits.

Organic Kombucha from the United Kingdom

Weâ€™ve mixed old-school tradition with contemporary crafting to create our top-secret brewing method. And guess what, Equinox Organic Kombucha is produced in the UK -craft brewed, bottled, and delivered from right here in the Calder Valley, West Yorkshire, UK.

Equinox Kombucha contains healthy living cultures and organic acids, perfect for a healthy gut and good digestion. Better still, it tastes amazing-zing-zing, so itâ€™s not hard to see why weâ€™re the nationâ€™s UK-manufactured favourite booch.

Â We create organic, living drinks that add life and vitalize everyone who drinks them.

â€œWe were founded on the vision that ethical, living products like Kombucha can make a massive difference to people all over the world. We really care about having a positive impact socially, environmentally, and economically and have this ecosystem of impact central to our vision, purpose, and execution. We donâ€™t shy away from difficult-to-tackle challenges and instead come together as a team to tenaciously find solutions that benefit everyone. We really care and for me this is rare.â€

Â 

Genevieve BoastÂ People and Sustainability @ Equinox

column3:
Zingi Bear is an organic Switchel producer based in the Lake DistrictÂ Â 

Founder Laurie is all about flavour. A trained cheesemaker and brewer, he is obsessed with great-tasting food and drink. A few years wiser, and several rounds later, he sought a healthier alternative treat, that still hit the spot - the only problem was what?

Soft drinks have needed to up their game for some time, so we started playing with the best natural and organic ingredients to create something special that did just that.

Better tasting, and better for you.

While having a lot of fun experimenting/fermenting/blending / brewing, we discovered an old-school style of drink called a 'switchel' - A super thirst-quenching beverage, once drunk by thirsty farmers as an elixir by day, and then as a mixer for spirits by night. This is what we had been searching for! All the flavours sat so well together - a zing from the apple cider vinegar, backed up by ginger and lemon, then rounded out with honey.Â 

Simple, delicious, and beyond refreshing.

'Zingi Bear' (from the Latin for ginger 'zingiber' - and how we thought it sounded) is our take on that drink. Made with responsibly sourced organic ingredients - taste first / no compromises.

Find it in your top local independents to Michelin star restaurants across the UK.Â 

ELIXIR BY DAY // MIXER BY NIGHT

Made in the UK, using only the best ORGANIC ingredients:

  • Pressed ginger root

  • Apple cider vinegar + the mother

  • Lemon juice

  • Acacia honey

  • Acerola cherry

  • Touch of Cornish sea salt

    Â 

  • We DO NOT use artificial preservatives // colours // flavours // concentrates // sweeteners

  • Completely natural & gluten-free.

  • Only 102 calories per 330ml bottle.

  • No plastic. Our label is made from FSC paper.

column3:
MatÃ©o is a refreshing, uplifting, and sparkling yerba matÃ© drink made with all-natural ingredients and no added sugar.

Our drinks are born out of a desire to turn yerba matÃ© into something cold, fizzy, and delicious. We want to share the incredible benefits with you in a way that is fun, approachable, and guilt-free.

After 12 months of recipe testing in his home kitchen, ex-chef Olie Ford emerged with three flavours: Original, Ginger, and Hibiscus. Each stems from quality ingredients and is crafted with care.

Yerba matÃ© is a South American tea-like leaf with a bunch of benefits. Itâ€™s as strong as coffee in the caffeine department but it affects you much differently. Itâ€™s slow-releasing, long-lasting, and with less of a crash later on. It means you can enjoy the effect of caffeine with less of the negative side effects. You also get to enjoy the benefits of several other compounds other than caffeine.Â 

The people of Argentina, Brazil, Paraguay, and Uruguay cherish Yerba MatÃ©.

Yerba matÃ© is quite a dynamic. People drink it daily for mental clarity, boosted mood, and physical energy as part of a morning ritual. Itâ€™s usually shared with friends and loved ones.

As well as our well-known stimulant friend caffeine, yerba matÃ© is abundant in two other powerful compounds. One is called theophylline, which is in green tea that fosters a sense of calm. The other is called theobromine, the same compound in dark chocolate, responsible for boosting your overall mood. When all together naturally in one drink, youâ€™re feeling pretty good. You feel energized and focused.

Yerba matÃ© is also extremely high in antioxidants, nutrients, and anti-inflammatory properties. Even more than its friend green tea.

It tastes delicious. We think even more so when cold and fizzy.

IngredientsÂ 

Original: Carbonated water, Yerba MatÃ© tea leaves, Erythritol, Food acid (Citric acid), Natural flavours, Acidity regulator (Sodium citrate), Natural colour (Chlorophyll), L-Theanine (From green tea), Green tea extract.Â 

Hibiscus: Carbonated water, Yerba MatÃ© tea leaves, Erythritol, Raspberry juice (0.5%), Hibiscus extract (0.1%), Natural flavours, Acidity regulator (Sodium citrate), Natural colour (Betanin), L-Theanine (From green tea), Green tea extract.Â 

Ginger: Carbonated water, Yerba MatÃ© tea leaves, Erythritol, Ginger juice (1.5%), Lemon juice (0.5%), Food Acid (Citric acid), Natural flavours, Acidity regulator (Sodium citrate), Natural colour (Cartamus), L-Theanine (From green tea), Green tea extract.Â

column3:
Our Values

The Good Guys is a Finnish organic kombucha brewery founded in 2018, whose mission is to help people, communities, and the environment by producing healthy, environmentally friendly, and alcohol-free drinks. We make kombucha from the world's best ingredients, respecting traditional fermentation methods.

Our Team

The Good Guys has grown from a small brewery of a group of friends to a team of 5 people. Our brewery is located in Pirkkala, Finland.

Our team is growing and we're excited to continue brewing delicious kombucha for cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, yoga studios, and gyms in Finland. Currently, we are expanding to other European countries so that more people can enjoy a can of The Good Guys kombucha.
We'll always be committed to quality so that every sip of The Good Guys kombucha is delicious and healthy. We're constantly developing new kombucha flavors and functional drinks that we hope will surprise and delight you.

The Good Guys handcrafted authentic kombucha straight from the heart of Pirkanmaa! Our kombucha is brewed with love and traditional fermentation methods, ensuring that all the goodness of kombucha is transferred into every bottle.

Our Mission

Helping people, communities, and the environment by producing healthy, environmentally friendly, and alcohol-free drinks.

column3:
Karma Kombucha The Soft Drink Reborn

Kombucha is a fermented tea-based beverage that has been used for over 2000 years. Originally from the Caucasus, naturally sparkling and tangy, rich in organic acids, Kombucha is known for its detoxifying and stimulating properties, but above all for its thirst-quenching fresh taste.

It is a healthy alternative to sodas, overly sweetened drinks and alcohol.

For Biogroupe, being organic is a continuous commitment.

Our commitments go beyond organic label requirements. 100% of our ingredients are certified organic even if regulations tolerate up to 5% of non-organic ones. Even when we use flavours (which is very scarce), we make sure they are 100% natural and organic! Of course, we do not use ingredients such as flavour enhancers, emulsifiers and food colouring that are prohibited by the organic standards, but we also make it a rule not to use animal- or soy-based ingredients in our products.
â€”
Since food must be our medicine, our future will be organic. By adopting an organic philosophy, we will be able to return the earth to those who labour it, rediscover the pleasure of foods that heal, and give the planet hope for a liveable future.

Their maceration and fermentation release the omnipotence of ginger to tease your taste buds. Sensitive souls refrain!

Noel and Donata started experimenting with simple homemade granola, which they packed and sold in their pioneering organic food shop, Windmill Wholefoods. It was so popular, that they quickly outgrew their kitchen table and Biona was born.

column3:
Breathing new life into an old classic.

At Purely, we handcraft 100% organic, artisanal fruit/root/herb/botanical infusions with ACV (apple cider vinegar) and the purest, cleanest, most deliciousÂ ingredients to empower you to feel good, wholesome and healthy... along the way with some fun in it too!Â 

Others call itÂ Drinking Vinegar or Shrub. It is a practice that dates thousands of years back and is considered an elixir due to its knownÂ health benefits.Â 

China has a documented history of vinegar-making that spans over 3,000 years. The Chinese made vinegar (cho) out of 3 main ingredients: grains such as barley, millet, and rice; fruits like dates, cherries, and peaches; and honey. In China, thereâ€™s an old saying â€” â€œFirewood, rice, oil, salt, soy sauce, vinegar, and tea are indispensable in our daily lifeâ€ â€” vinegar plays an important role in the Chinese lifestyle for its healing properties for the body.

Humble beginnings.

Growing up, I watched my grandmother infuse fresh plums and seasonal fruits in rice vinegar sweetened with honey. We drank a lot of fruit, herb, root infusions that are nourishing and healing for our body and mind.

Inspired by the memories of my grandmother's recipes, Purely was founded in my kitchen, and perfected with a modern approach to meet our consumers' needs today - organic ingredients, low sugar, vegan, gluten-free, and locally sourced.

My passion and purpose for Purely startedÂ with one thing in mind: to open up a cultural experience through connection, unity and joy.

Our mission.

We believe the simple choices we make can have a lasting and meaningful impact on someoneâ€™s life and the world. We create delicious functional beverages that consumers love, but our purpose extends beyond the impact on the consumer. We reach small places around the world and locally by giving less fortunate women work and meaning. Additionally, we choose a charity or NPO to support each month. Every time you purchase a bottle of Purely, $1 will be donated to the selected charity. Purely is a catalyst to improve the quality of people's lives. This is the focus of our mission and the driving force behind Purely.

Our Vision.

We envision Purely as a brand that drives a healthier, more just, and inclusive world that makes people feel good inside and out. We believe that happier guts make for a happier world. We see Purely as more than a functional drink, it is part of a larger movement to make the world more connected by bridging cultures with a classic that has been lost.

Our promise.

We will never compromise on quality. We use only the best ingredients nature has to offer. To empower sustainability at the root level, we want to fundamentally change the food system for the better. As a step towards this goal, we source surplus and imperfect produce and fruits for our infusion process. We believe in supporting local and keeping our recipes pure, simple, and delicious.

ï»¿
We are farmers and drink makers from Japan, following the "Kanso" philosophy â€“ using only what is necessary. We hand-pick our seasonal fruits and use naturally sourced water from the Hyogo mountains in the Kansai region to add to the flavor and texture of our drinks.
Our Yuzu fruit is sourced from a multigenerational farm of Shikoku, a pioneer of conservationism in the region. The first in the area to abandon pesticides, our friends in Kochi embrace the traditional methods. This way, our fruit is picked only by hand and the trees' nutrients are returned to the earth. In their forgoing of popular partnerships and promoting 'do-nothing' farming, our friends demonstrate for the community an alternative way to grow.

Yuzu Sparkling Juice

Ingredients:

Our sparkling yuzu juice is made with hand-picked Yuzu from Shikoku Island, Hyogo region water, and organic sugar cane.

Ume Sparkling Juice

Ingredients:

Our ume plums are hand-picked in Wakayama and whole-pressed with Hyogo regionÂ water and organic sugar cane.

Mikan Sparkling Juice

Ingredients:

Our Mikan are hand-picked in Wakayama and whole-pressed with Hyogo regionÂ water and organic sugar cane.

Ringo Sparkling Juice

Ingredients:

Our Fuji Ringo apples are hand-picked in the Aomori Region beyond the Northern Hakkoda mountains and whole-pressed withÂ Hyogo regionÂ water.

We harvest throughout Japan's countryside using traditional methods that conserve and support the natural environment. These farms belong to the next generation to care for and share from. We are grateful to support small family-owned farms and protect natural farming while aspiring to apply these techniques to our own farms.

Â

column3:
An innovative twist on a classic

Meet Ginger Beer, our first-ever upcycled product.


We're proud members of the Upcycled Food Association, which defines upcycling asÂ "Foods [which] use ingredients that otherwise would not have gone to human consumption, are procured and produced using verifiable supply chains, andÂ have a positive impact on the environment."

Ginger Beer is made by upcycling ginger pulpâ€”the fibrous by-product left over from when we cold-press organic ginger root. We brew this pulp into ginger tea, which we use as a base for the rest of the recipe, transforming what would otherwise be considered food waste into something new and delicious.

With a tickling ginger flavour more on the light, refreshing end of the scale, Ginger Beer's gentle warmth lingers in your throat without overwhelming your tastebudsâ€”think fuzzy, not fiery. Cold-pressed lime brings subtle citrus notes, complementine ginger tones with bright ones in every sip.

At just 4g of sugar per bottle, it's a much lower-sugar alternative to soda and great for adding a spark of warmth to your fall and winter cocktails.

Â 

IngredientsÂ 

Filtered Water, Organic Ginger Tea, Organic Ginger, Organic Lime, Organic Cane Sugar, Chicory Root Inulin, Organic Lemon Powder, Citrus Fibre, Organic Stevia Leaf Extract, Organic Monk Fruit Juice Concentrate.

column3:
Hi, Iâ€™m Shannon, and I couldnâ€™t be more thrilled to introduce myself and share my story with you! My story of experiencing the healing benefits of fermented foods came from my diagnosis with Celiac disease in 2010. I learned about the benefits of consuming a diet rich in fermented food from reading The Art of Fermentation and started experimenting in the kitchen shortly after that. My love for kombucha, coupled with my passion for cultivating community, spreading knowledge and supporting local organic food systems led me to open Booch Organic Kombuchaâ€”a company that mirrored my own personal values and allowed me to practice my creativity through the art of kombucha fermentation. Booch is a heart-centered business; operating with eco-regenerative business practises, synergy, connection, gratitude, compassion, purpose and love. I started fermenting jun after a trip to Guatemala in 2016 where I took part of week-long fermentation course through Love Probiotics. After a week, I was inspired to start fermenting other foods and beverages including jun, beet kvass, steel cut oats, kefir and fruit vinegars. Before I flew back to Canada, they gifted me a jun SCOBY: a symbiotic culture of bacteria and yeast that is unique to jun; using organic Sencha Green Tea and Local Raw Honey. Since 2016 I have nurtured this SCOBY, slowly getting it accustomed to local Ontario honey. I knew I wanted to expand the Booch brand beyond kombucha and Jun was the perfect fit! Iâ€™M SO PLEASED TO INTRODUCE TO YOU MOONBREW BY BOOCH. Offering you a healing beverage that is brewed with love and care, using only the best quality organic and wild-crafted ingredients. This beverage is being introduced to you as an extension of our organic fermented beverages, with the hope of adding even more diversity to your gut. Please drink with intention and attention. With love, Shannon

ORGANIC GREEN TEA + HONEY TONICS INFUSED WITH HEALING HERBS & BOTANICALS

Truly raw and naturally wild, Jun is known as the â€˜champagne of kombuchaâ€™. Traditionally fermented with honey, Jun contains B vitamins, organic acids, and potent strains of beneficial bacterial culture.

Integrity is imperative.
Each brew is crafted with the same four ingredients, raw jun culture, organic honey, filtered water, and organic Sencha tea.
To ensure the bioavailability of the bacteria, we do not pasteurize or force-carbonate.
